installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update && apt install -y build-essential cmake git wget curl libssl-dev
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "1" ]; then
  echo "User upload enabled, skipping git clone"
  exit 0
fi

if [ -z "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]; then
  echo "No git repo specified"
  exit 0
fi

if [[ ${GIT_ADDRESS} != *.git ]]; then
  GIT_ADDRESS=${GIT_ADDRESS}.git
fi

if [ -z "${BRANCH}" ]; then
  git clone ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
else
  git clone --single-branch --branch ${BRANCH} ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
fi
